data.title: WL Everclear Concert Chronology 2004
data.text:
Know of a date we're missing? Know more about a specific show? Have a review to submit? Let us know!

Jan 23 - Ewing NJ: Kendall Hall

Other Band: Adam Richman

Setlist: Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Heartspark Dollarsign / Everything to Everyone / Strawberry / Glorious / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / Santa Monica / Summerland [Partial] / Nervous & Weird / I Will Buy You a New Life

Notes: Art solo. College of New Jersey.

Feb 3 - Charleston SC: Stern Hall

Notes: Art solo. College of Charleston. Art played a couple of songs to warm up the crowd at a campaign event for presidential candidate John Edwards.

Feb 7 - Portland OR: Mt Tabor Theater

Other Bands (Electric Stage): Sketchy Ted, The Film, The Christine Young Band, Mars Needs Women, Fairfield, Derby, Transmitter

Notes: Art solo. A benefit concert for Friends of Reservoirs.

Mar 18 - Austin TX: The Vibe

Other Bands: Thee Shams, The Autumn Defense, Susan Cowsill and the Midcity Ministers, Walter Clevenger & The Dairy Kings, The Nice Outfit

Notes: Art solo. Part of the 2004 South by Southwest Music Festival.

Apr 11 - Portland OR: Level

Setlist (Approximate): Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Loser Makes Good / Fire Maple Song / Everything to Everyone / Glorious / Brown Eyed Girl / Father of Mine / Santa Monica / Strawberry

Notes: Art solo. Art's "birthday bash" to mark his 42nd birthday. Art got his nipples pierced at the end of the night.

Apr 17 - Long Beach CA: Grand Prix of Long Beach

Setlist: Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Everything to Everyone / Summerland / Loser Makes Good / Fire Maple Song / Strawberry / Brown Eyed Girl / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life / Pink Cadillac / Santa Monica

Notes: Part of the Toyota Grand Prix of Long Beach. The debut of the "new" Everclear (without Craig and Greg), including touring members drummer Eric Bretl, guitarist Dave French, and bassist Sam Hudson.

May 17 - Portland OR: Pioneer Courthouse Square

Setlist (Approximate): Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / I Will Buy You a New Life / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Santa Monica

Notes: Art solo. A rally for Presidential candidate John Kerry. Former candidate Howard Dean also appeared. Rally aired live on local tv station KATU.

May 22 - Portland OR: Machineworks

Setlist: Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Santa Monica

Notes: Art solo. Art played the VIP pre-show of RISE, an event put on by political grass-roots organization The Bus Project.

June 19 - Racine WI: Festival Park

Other Bands (Flagship Stage): Kory and the Fireflies, Blue Background, Brother, Abstract Thought, Jinx Lee & The Fabulous Blue Ravens

Setlist (Approximate): Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Heroin Girl / Everything to Everyone / Heartspark Dollarsign / Strawberry [Art Solo] / Brown Eyed Girl [Art Solo] / Glorius / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life / This Land Is Your Land (Woody Guthrie) / Loser Makes Good / Santa Monica

Notes: Harborfest 2004.

July 2 - Atlanta GA: Centennial Olympic Park

Other Bands: Pat McGee Band, Michael Tolcher, Pete Schmidt

Setlist: Song from an American Movie, Pt 1 [Art solo] / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Heartspark Dollarsign / Loser Makes Good / Strawberry [Art solo] / Brown Eyed Girl [Art solo] / Glorious / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life / Everything to Everyone / This Land Is Your Land / Santa Monica

Notes: Aquafina On the Bricks. First show with touring keyboardist Josh Crawley.

July 17 - Nashville TN: Riverfront Park

Other Bands: Virginia Coalition, Michael Tolcher, Laws Rushing, Jackson Sneed

Setlist (Approximate): Song from an American Movie Pt 1 [Art Solo] / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Everything to Everyone / Heartspark Dollarsign / Loser Makes Good / Strawberry [Art Solo] / Brown Eyed Girl [Art Solo] / Glorious / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life / This Land is Your Land / Fire Maple Song / Santa Monica

Notes: Bridgestone Dancin in the District.

Aug 15 - Seattle WA: Experience Music Project

Setlist (Approximate): Song From An American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Everything to Everyone / Strawberry / Brown Eyed Girl / Glorius / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / Beautiful Dream / This Land is Your Land / Santa Monica // Annabella's Song [Partial] / I Will Buy You a New Life / Fire Maple Song [Partial]

Notes: Art solo. Part of EMP's Family-Friendly Concert Series.

Aug 20 - Cleveland OH: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame

Other Band: The Von Bondies

Notes: Promotion for Miller's 50 Years of Rock and Roll. Concert tickets had to be won from participating radio stations.

Aug 21 - Portland OR: Dante's

Other Bands: Storm & the Balls, The Dresden Dolls, The Jolenes

Notes: Art solo. Debutantes Ball: A Benefit for NARAL / Pro-Choice America.

Aug 28 - Raleigh NC: Moore Square

Other Bands: Crossfade, The Clear, Parmalade

Notes: Miller Lite / 96 Rock Freefest. Free outdoor show (for those over 21).

Aug 29 - Charlotte NC: Visulite Theater

Other Band: Need to Breathe

Aug 30 - Hilton Head SC: Monkey Business

Setlist: Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Everything to Everyone / Heartspark Dollarsign / Loser Makes Good / Strawberry / Brown Eyed Girl / Glorious / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Fire Maple Song / Beautiful Dream / This Land Is Your Land / Santa Monica

Sep 15 - Jacksonville FL: UNF Arena

Other Band: Milka

Setlist: Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Everything to Everyone / Heartspark Dollarsign / Loser Makes Good / Strawberry / Brown Eyed Girl / Glorious / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Beautiful Dream / This Land Is Your Land / Santa Monica

Notes: University of North Florida. Free concert, part of a voter registration event on campus. Moved indoors from UNF Green at the last minute. However, the move was under-publicized, so attendance was spotty.

Sep 16 - Orlando FL: House of Blues

Other Band: Still Naive

Setlist: Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Everything To Everyone / Heartspark Dollarsign / Loser Makes Good / Strawberry / Brown Eyed Girl / Glorious / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Beautiful Dream / This Land Is Your Land / Santa Monica

Sep 17 - St Petersburg FL: Jannus Landing

Other Band: Sentdown

Setlist: Song from an American Movie Pt 1 / Wonderful / Heroin Girl / Everything To Everyone / Heartspark Dollarsign / Loser Makes Good / Strawberry / Brown Eyed Girl / Glorious / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Beautiful Dream / This Land Is Your Land / Santa Monica

Oct 7 - Portland OR: Roseland Theater

Other Bands: Breaking Benjamin, Future Leaders of the World, Thornley

Notes: Art solo. A Non-Partisan Voter Registration Drive concert held by Rock the Vote. Art played a half-hour acoustic set prior to Breaking Benjamin's headlining set.

Oct 8 - Portland OR: Bossanova Ballroom

Other Bands: Pepe and the Bottle Blondes, The Ditty Twisters, Rubberneck

Notes: Art solo. Potter Palooza. A benefit for Tom Potter, a Portland mayoral candidate.

Oct 23 - Daly City CA: Cow Palace

Other Bands (Main Stage): Glamnation, 2 Live Crew, Stymie & The Pimp Jones Luv Orchestra

Notes: 25th Anniversary Exotic Erotic Ball. An evening of "adult entertainment", featuring live bands, dj's, strippers, and dancers. Tickets were $69.

Oct 28 - Johnson City TN: Intramural Field

Other Bands (Main Stage): Gretchen, NDividuals, Winter of 74

Notes: East Tennessee State University. Part of ETSU's Homecoming.

Oct 31 - Portland OR: Crystal Ballroom

Other Bands: March Fourth Marching Band, Plasma and Liv, Hip Hop Collaborative featuring Soul, Woke Up Falling, The Retrofits, Hillstomp

Notes: Billed as "Art Alexakis with Friends". Show was an effort organized by Trick or Vote, a voter mobilization project.

Nov 3 - Philadelphia PA: Theater of the Living Arts

Other Band: Avion

Setlist: Everything to Everyone / Heroin Girl / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Fire Maple Song / Annabella's Song / Sex with a Movie Star / Strawberry / Summerland / Wonderful / Learning How to Smile / Glorious / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Beautiful Dream / Local God / Santa Monica

Nov 4 - New York NY: Last Call with Carson Daly (NBC)

Setlist: Santa Monica

Notes: Aired the night of November 10th.

Nov 5 - New York NY: Irving Plaza

Other Band: Avion

Setlist (Approximate): Everything to Everyone / Heroin Girl / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Fire Maple Song / Annabella's Song / Sex with a Movie Star / Strawberry / Summerland / Wonderful / Learning How to Smile / Glorious / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Beautiful Dream / Local God / Santa Monica / Jenny 867-5309 (Tommy Tutone)

Nov 6 - Hartford CT: Webster Theatre

Other Band: Avion

Nov 7 - Washington DC: 9:30 Club

Other Band: Avion

Nov 9 - Sayreville NJ: Starland Ballroom

Other Band: Avion

Nov 10 - Boston MA: Paradise Rock Club

Other Band: Avion

Nov 11 - Reading PA: Club 1402

Other Band: Avion

Nov 12 - Johnson City NY: Magic City Music Hall

Other Band: Avion

Nov 14 - Ann Arbor MI: Briarwood Mall

Notes: Afternoon show. Free show, sponsored by Victoria's Secret for Team PINK of the University of Michigan.

Nov 14 - Detroit MI: St Andrews Hall

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 15 - Indianapolis IN: The Vogue

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Setlist: Everything to Everyone / Heroin Girl / Annabella's Song / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Strawberry / Learning How to Smile / Heartspark Dollarsign / Fire Maple Song / Summerland / Wonderful / I Will Buy You a New Life / Father of Mine // Beautiful Dream Local God / Santa Monica / Jenny 867-5309

Nov 16 - Chicago IL: House of Blues

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 17 - Madison WI: Luther's Blues

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 18 - Minneapolis MN: Cabooze

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Setlist: Everything to Everyone / Heroin Girl / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Fire Maple Song / Annabella's Song / [Teasers] / Heartspark Dollarsign / [Teasers] / Strawberry [Art Solo] / Learning How to Smile / Summerland / Wonderful / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Local God / Santa Monica // Jenny 867-5309

Notes: Moved from First Avenue when its owner unexpectedly filed for bankruptcy, closing the venue.

Nov 20 - Salt Lake City UT: The Velvet Room

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 22 - Missoula MT: Wilma Theatre

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 23 - Seattle WA: Crocodile Cafe

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 24 - Portland OR: Bossanova Ballroom

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Setlist: Everything to Everyone / Heroin Girl / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Fire Maple Song / Annabella's Song / Heartspark Dollarsign / Song from an American Movie, Pt 1 / Strawberry [Art Solo] / Learning How to Smile / Glorious / Summerland / Wonderful / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Beautiful Dream / Local God / Santa Monica // Jenny 867-5309

Nov 26 - Spokane WA: Big Easy Concert House

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 27 - Boise ID: Big Easy Concert House

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 29 - Hollywood CA: House of Blues

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Nov 30 - Las Vegas NV: House of Blues

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Dec 1 - Hollywood CA: Late Late Show (with Michael Ian Black)

Setlist: Father of Mine

Dec 2 - Anaheim CA: House of Blues

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Dec 3 - San Diego CA: 4th and B

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Dec 4 - Tucson AZ: City Limits

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Dec 5 - Scottdale AZ: Venue of Scottdale

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Setlist: Everything to Everyone / Heroin Girl / Volvo Driving Soccer Mom / Fire Maple Song / Annabella's Song / Heartspark Dollarsign / Strawberry [Art Solo] / Learning How to Smile / Summerland / Wonderful / Father of Mine / I Will Buy You a New Life // Santa Monica // Jenny 867-5309

Dec 7 - Santa Cruz CA: The Catalyst

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher

Dec 8 - San Francisco CA: The Fillmore

Other Bands: Avion, Michael Tolcher
